title: Unspecified error occurred . please check the logs for more information
body: i got this error when i  was INSTALLING LEAGUE PLEASE HELP

replies.body: An unspecified error could mean different things depending on what point in the patcher it occurred.  For most cases, it is due to your system blocking the patcher from scanning or downloading files.  As a first step, I recommend following the steps in our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to resolve this.  If your issue still occurs afterwards, please let me know!
installation lasts untill 33% and then error pops up

> [{quoted}](name=luxxyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TnjhuWxE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-17T17:29:43.491+0000)
